thread.title: I learnt a lot from Dinesh: Nivetha
thread.title_full: I learnt a lot from Dinesh: Nivetha - The Times of India

author: Logesh Balachandran
title: I learnt a lot from Dinesh: Nivetha
text:
Nivetha Pethuraj, the Miss India UAE 2015 winner, is excited about her debut in Kollywood. She plays one of the female leads in Oru Naal Koothu, which has Dinesh in the lead.
Nivetha says that her fluency in Tamil was one of the reasons for her landing this role. "After winning the pagent, I came to Chennai for the film's audition. I came to know about this through a fashion designer friend of mine in the city. One of the reasons why the makers chose me is because I am very fluent in Tamil. Though I'm in Dubai, I'm a pucca Madurai ponnu," she says.
About her role, she says, "My character's name in the film is Kavya. She is an IT professional. The film revolves around three stories and my portion is a sort-of romantic comedy."
She calls working with Dinesh a great experience. "He patiently taught me so much on the set, and I learnt a lot from him," she says, and adds, "As of now, I am reading a few scripts and waiting to sign one."
